content.raw:
Hi Jeff, your changes look good but I'm not sure that the class will work anymore, since there was an additional loop that had to be introduced for compound bases.   Now the arrays returned by the build_matrices method are expected to have 1 higher dimension which indexes the matrices for each sub basis (because in general the expansion of NCCs is different for each sub basis).

Constructing the matrices I think would be so cumbersome at this point to be essentially unusable, and since we can pretty easily inspect the matrices produced by the ParsedProblem for errors, I might be in favor of just removing the old matrix problem class instead of trying to maintain it at the complexity of the parsed problem.  What are your thoughts about this?
